about.title: About me
about.p1: Hi! I’m Jérémy Goulet. I’m a french canadian living in Quebec City studying multimedia.
about.p2: I like to design and reverse engineer designs to understands what went through the head of the designer. I also like to make websites and code. I am fluent in HTML, CSS (SASS), jQuery, Javascript, TypeScript, and SQL.

p3.p3a: In summer of 2016, I interned as a Web developer and designer at
